Literature.Title: Synthesis and Evaluation of Antimycobacterial and Antiplasmodial Activities of Hirsutellide A and Its Analogues.
Literature.Author: Sahile HA, Martinez-Martinez MS, Dillenberger M, Becker K, Imming P

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Mycobacterium tuberculosis H37Rv(MIC=>80µM),Plasmodium falciparum 3D7(IC50=7.7µM),Human hepatocellular carcinoma HepG2(IC50=>100µM)
